question: Recently, the Government of India announced the Prime Ministerâ€™s Shram Awards for the year 2016. Shram Awards are given in four categories. Which of the following is not the one among them?
explanation: Shram Awards are given in four categories namely \"Shram Ratna Award\", \"Shram Bhushan Award\", \"Shram Vir/Shram Virangana\" and \"Shram Shree/Shram Devi Awards\".
